director.name: 洛里斯·朱塞佩·倪子冈 Loris G. Nese

introduction: Two brothers, Armandino (6) and Vittorio (11), are playing in their garden when the sound of an explosion interrupts them, marking a change. They receive news of their father’s death. With their mother they move into the paternal grandmother’s house, where the shadows of a dark past begin to stir. Armandino realises that everything he knew was a lie. Like the rest of the family, his father was affiliated with organised crime and was murdered. Vittorio, charged by the hovering evil, subdues his brother more and more, until Armandino, in a burst of rage, gets rid of his ghosts once and for all.
